item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 25th March
item.description:
2 HOUR WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE NEEDED PLEASE REMOVE X1 DAMAGED LEANING LOSE POST AND MAKE SAFE WITH X4 1 METER BARRIERS AND X4 SANDBAGS I WILL PASS PERMANENT REPAIR ON TO AHR TODAY (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign has been cut off to prevent people walking on the footpath through fieldd, 25th March
item.description:
The footpath sign has been cut off to prevent people walking on the footpath through the field (the actual footpath is also highly unusable with no stiles, barbed wire and blocked entry/exit points).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Branch Road, The Reddings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath is blocked with barbed wire and completely inaccessible from other direction, 25th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Golden Valley Junction, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo on Pilley Lane, 25th March
item.description:
I'm so sorry but there's yet more poo on Pilley Lane just opposite the church (across the road); please could it be cleaned up as people keep standing in it. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pilley Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole!!!!!!!!, 25th March
item.description:
Massive pothole that has got larger and larger, have had to replace two tyres, due to the speed limit you aren't aware of the pot hole until your in it or swerve into the oncoming cars, absolute disgrace!! you need to sort these roads out travelling to and from work daily is dangerous both ways!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
